title: Silent Encroachment
description: Criminal defense attorney Andrew Schaefer uncovers a conspiracy involving his mentor, James Miller, which jeopardizes his career, his family, and his life. He commits to end the conspiracy before he fully understands how far it extends. His best friend, a former Air Force pararescueman, is his only hope to remain alive as he gathers evidence to present to the FBI to break a network of corruption that has infiltrated many of the country's most renowned law firms.
author: Evan Joseph Law
